data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Oussama Darfalou is on target to give Vitesse a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 39, Lois Openda with an assist there.
The first-half has come to a close in Arnhem.
The second half has started at Gelredome.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Oliver Batista Meier with Rami Hajal. This is the first substitution made today by Johnny Jansen.
Sherel Floranus grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Gelredome.
Lucas Woudenberg (Heerenveen) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 68, At Gelredome, Maximilian Wittek has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Million Manhoef, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Hillary Gong is the substitute for Vitesse.
Daan Huisman is on a sub for Lois Openda for Vitesse.
In the minute 87, Vitesse's Riechedly Bazoer has been booked in Arnhem.
The match has come to a close in Arnhem. The final score is 1-1.
Sherel Floranus (Heerenveen) gets a yellow card.
Thomas Buitink is replacing Oussama Darfalou for Vitesse at Gelredome.
